description:
All your AI tools together in one simple app.
AI Hub lets you use many AI tools in one simple place. No need to jump between apps.

**Key features:**

* Fast tab switching
* Clean Material Design 3
* Dynamic colors and auto light/dark theme
* Remembers the last AI you used
* Enable or disable any AI you want
* No trackers

Perfect for anyone who uses multiple AI tools daily.
Open-source, free, and easy to use.

Use all your AIs together in one clean app!
